name: Loom Print — Reservation ticket
description:
Collecting an edition of this ticket allows owners of a Loom NFT by Andreas Rau (fxhash.xyz/generative/79) to order the corresponding signed print.

You will receive a museum quality Giclée print on acid-free fine art paper printed by a local artist-run print shop in Oslo, Norway and signed by the artist.

Paper: Hahnemühle Photo Rag, 308gsm 
Print size: ca. 30 × 30 cm (about 11,8″)
Paper size: 40 × 40 cm (about 15,75″)

International shipping is included in the price of this ticket.

Eligibility for signed prints is awarded to all holders of Loom NFTs, regardless if a print of that particular NFT has been ordered before. The total amount of prints, however, is limited to 480 editions, matching the size of the Loom collection.

Place your reservation on andreasrau.eu/loom. Your can expect orders to take about two to three weeks plus shipping.

Original artwork by Andreas Rau · Oslo, 2022
